![](https://ho-ost.com/templates/hostio/images/logo.png)

Hello, I represent Ho-ost.com - You may have seen me post our shared hosting offers recently. But we also sell Virtual Servers using KVM virtualisation and the Virtualizor Control Panel. We established as a private company at the beginning of 2016 and have been going strong ever since.

Take a look at our offers, and use the promocode **LETKVM10** for a 10% recurring discount on any of our packages.

Looking Glass:  http://lookingglass.ho-ost.com/LookingGlass-master/index.php

Windows Not Available

If you have any questions, please email hello@ho-ost.com or respond below

Please be aware, we offer backup services for our shared and reseller hosting packages. However, it is the customers full responsibility to maintain your own backups for our virtual private servers. These are unmanaged.
